messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Please note: The station is to cease mention of the Fappening 2.

Failure to do so will result in emergency cleansing.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Due to a failure of an experimental bluespace teleporter, the only existing disk of The Fappening 2 is now on your station.

Please make every attempt to locate and incinerate it.

Compliance will result in great rewards.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We got the Fappening 2, say tuned for a theater screening in the chapel

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Look at me...look..at....me. I am now the capiten.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Please note: Watching The Fappening 2 will result in the termination of your contract.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Please note: Not handing over The Fappening 2 to our agent will result in the destruction of this facility.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Destruction also works, I guess. Well done.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Testing Lab.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: After some weird time-travel shenanigans the Fappening 2 is erased from our timeline,

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We are aware of the secondary disk.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We have sent our last agent. Centcomm is slowly being erased. Please destroy The Fappening 2.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: There are 3 copies.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Research Director's Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Unknown. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Transmitting code: 99443. Shuttle will be rushed to station upon activation of self-destruct.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Self-destruct is the only way to destroy The Fappening 2.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: There are 3.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Centcomm is always right.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Supermatter delamination: Unavoidable.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Well, it is avoidable, really easily, but...

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Please stand back from shuttle dock.
